search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Harness (harness.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Harness can be found at: [https://www.harness.io/pricing](https://www.harness.io/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Flexible and modular pricing
===============
      

![Image 17: Unifying AI & DevOps to Accelerate Innovation](https://cms.harness.io/images/devx-2025-logo.svg)

Transform DevEx with AI & Platform Engineering  |  May 21, 2025

[Register Now](https://www.harness.io/event/developer-experience-summit?utm_source=harness_io&utm_medium=sticky_banner&utm_campaign=devx&utm_content=sticky_banner)

![Image 18: Close banner](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/65f4ad3613eef9d7409b6ecf_banner_popup_dummy_close_icon_01.svg)

[![Image 19: harness logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/65aada95970b01f49948895a_harness_logo_white.svg)](https://www.harness.io/)

Product

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6616e51a0428495515f4b132_nav-dropdown-arrow.svg)

Modernize DevOps

Upgrade your software delivery with Harness' innovative DevOps tools.

[![Image 21: Continuous Delivery & GitOps](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/622d5f12f85ef648a5e5ff53_icon-cd.svg) Continuous Delivery & GitOps NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/continuous-delivery)

[![Image 22: Continuous Integration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/6233c6c9a9079d642da0ddda_icon-ci.svg) Continuous Integration NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/continuous-integration)

[![Image 23: Feature Management & Experimentation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/66f3561162b948b556dc8e37_FME-logo.svg) Feature Management & Experimentation NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/feature-management-experimentation)

[![Image 24: Infrastructure as Code Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/64e7a73adf75be3a06e64c9c_IaC-product-icon--Solid.svg) Infrastructure as Code Management NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/infrastructure-as-code-management)

[![Image 25: Chaos Engineering](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/62fbc9dc25b0e264824968f0_625ec07af7e112aa08643eee_icon-ce.webp) Chaos Engineering NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/chaos-engineering)

[![Image 26: Incident Response](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/6790f9b74045ec454ce615af_IRO.svg) Incident Response NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/incident-response)

[![Image 27: Service Reliability Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/62fbca0234c3d92a913fa088_6234cd5a677016dbecbec5d5_SRM-color-filled.webp) Service Reliability Management NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/service-reliability-management)

[![Image 28: Database DevOps](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/672d37b84b4e1c2982182c22_db-devops-icon.svg) Database DevOps NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/database-devops)

[![Image 29: Artifact Registry](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/66df6b5a2412cc4f06c3f126_artifact-registry-logo-icon.svg) Artifact Registry NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/artifact-registry)

Measure and Improve DevEx

Leverage automation and insights to improve developer productivity.

[![Image 30: Internal Developer Portal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/66e3ad3ea2fe9b7c8432a740_Internal%20Developer%20Portal.svg) Internal Developer Portal NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/internal-developer-portal)

[![Image 31: Software Engineering Insights](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/672d37c6041e6f6b14688ab9_sei-icon.svg) Software Engineering Insights NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/software-engineering-insights)

[![Image 32: Cloud Development Environments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/66f358005abc0214071cae8f_CDE.svg) Cloud Development Environments NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/cloud-development-environments)

Secure Software Delivery

Integrate security in the delivery pipeline to ensure software supply chain integrity.

[![Image 33: Security Testing Orchestration](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/62fbc9f3562e466ea020a594_6234cd5a6770167e95bec5f8_STO.webp) Security Testing Orchestration NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/security-testing-orchestration)

[![Image 34: Supply Chain Security](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/66e4bc13fc09811455097b51_supply%20chain%20security%20logo.svg) Supply Chain Security NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/supply-chain-security)

Optimize Cloud Spend

Eliminate waste, improve financial visibility, and apply proper cost tracking in the cloud.

[![Image 35: Cloud Cost Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/6233c6e11c563d8aa28b056f_icon-ccm.svg) Cloud Cost Management NEW](https://www.harness.io/products/cloud-cost-management)

Harness AI

Leverage enterprise-ready AI assistants to eliminate toil across the entire software delivery life cycle.

[![Image 36: AI DevOps Agent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/66f3517a3142d2f0abc50385_AI-Solid.svg) AI DevOps Agent free](https://www.harness.io/products/ai-native-software-delivery#ai-devops-agent)

[![Image 37: AI Test Automation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/622642781cd7e96ac1f66807/67f6c9602be641ef14b20da5_AI%20Test%20Automation-logo.svg) AI Test Automation free](https://www.harness.io/products/ai-test-automation)

Flexible and Modular Pricing
============================

Open Source

[Litmus Chaos \-\>](https://litmuschaos.io/)

Essentials
----------

For growing organizations with small to mid-size teams

Plan Details
------------

### Essentials

### Essentials to get started

![Image 65](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6797617188fa676356f15476_pricing_plan-line.avif)

### Enterprise

### Select modules that are right for you

![Image 66](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6797617188fa676356f15476_pricing_plan-line.avif)

### DevOps Essentials

Includes

![Image 67](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679744af85237d2521919e8f_cd_icon-white.svg)Continuous Delivery & GitOps

World's most advanced CD Platform, designed to deploy any app to any cloud, with built-in advanced deployment strategies, AI-powered deployment verifications, and automated rollbacks. Use GitOps or push-based deployments. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/continuous-delivery)

![Image 68](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 69](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679744e7951f938a35486df8_ci_icon-white.svg)Continuous Integration

World's fastest CI - Witness 4X faster builds, robust security, and cost efficiency, all streamlined into one powerful, developer-friendly platform. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/continuous-integration)

![Image 70](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 71](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6797454c4a7253bbcb558dc7_iac_icon-white.svg)Infrastructure as Code Management

Automate and standardize infrastructure provisioning. Enable developer self-service while improving governance. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/infrastructure-as-code-management)

![Image 72](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 73](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679745ab85a2efcf7f94aaef_sto_solid-white.svg)Security Testing Orchestration

Shift-left security by seamlessly integrating security scanners and orchestrating tests anywhere across your build pipelines, allowing developers to rapidly remediate vulnerabilities through intelligent prioritization and deduplication. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/security-testing-orchestration)

![Image 74](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

### Modernize DevOps

Accelerate software delivery automation

![Image 75](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679744af85237d2521919e8f_cd_icon-white.svg)Continuous Delivery & GitOps

World's most advanced CD Platform, designed to deploy any app to any cloud, with built-in advanced deployment strategies, AI-powered deployment verifications, and automated rollbacks. Use GitOps or push-based deployments. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/continuous-delivery)

![Image 76](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 77](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679744e7951f938a35486df8_ci_icon-white.svg)Continuous Integration

World's fastest CI - Witness 4X faster builds, robust security, and cost efficiency, all streamlined into one powerful, developer-friendly platform. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/continuous-integration)

![Image 78](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 79](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6797454c4a7253bbcb558dc7_iac_icon-white.svg)Infrastructure as Code Management

Automate and standardize infrastructure provisioning. Enable developer self-service while improving governance. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/infrastructure-as-code-management)

![Image 80](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 81](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/66f18827774d1adda3dc7c08_artifact%20registry%20icon%20white.svg)Artifact Registry

Simplify artifact management, bringing all your artifacts into one place, including your Docker images and Helm charts.

![Image 82](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 83](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679745f87deca968c35aed61_Frame%201321323489.svg)Feature Management & Experimentation

Feature Management and Experimentation gives you the confidence to accelerate release velocity without breaking things. Connect every flag with contextual data, so you can instantly detect and triage any issues.

![Image 84](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 85](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/67974680ee28983dcddfa5b6_ce_solid-white.svg)Chaos Engineering

Harness Chaos Engineering is powered by CNCF Litmus project - increase system resilience, optimize costs, improve customer experience and drive faster incident report times with Harness Chaos Engineering, that supports industry's widest coverage on Chaos Faults, fully automated journey to resilience, seamless integration with pipelines and ChaosGuard for easy scaling. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/chaos-engineering)

![Image 86](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 87](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679746de4a5c8ad2488755d1_srm_solid-white.svg)Service Reliability Management

Provide automated SLO management, Change Impact Analysis and Automated Governance, to empower Developer & SRE teams in bringing control and reliability to your Service rollouts. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/service-reliability-management)

![Image 88](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 89](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679746bfa5e9f602722c9609_dd_solid-white.svg)Database DevOps

Integrate database changes into your deployment pipeline and gain database transparency across environments.

![Image 90](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

### Improve Developer Experience

Optimize flow to improve productivity

![Image 91](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6797470a6a407408cda18851_sei_solid-white.svg)Software Engineering Insights

Discover SDLC bottlenecks, assess team productivity, and improve developer experience guided by data and insights. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/software-engineering-insights)

![Image 92](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 93](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/67d435365a2c5039c97b7a6e_idp.svg)Internal Developer Portal

Harness Internal Developer Portal is powered by Backstage - Onboard Developers & Services in minutes, build software catalogs, allow complete Developer Self-Service and empower your R&D organization with Service maturity models & scorecards. Minimum 20 Developer licenses must be purchased for IDP. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/internal-developer-portal)

![Image 94](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 95](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6797461b34c6d7ae76984897_32.svg)Cloud Development Environments

Dedicated, pre-configured, hosted development environments (Gitspaces™️) connected to your favorite IDE.

![Image 96](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

### Secure Software Delivery

Ensure compliance and governance

![Image 97](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/679745ab85a2efcf7f94aaef_sto_solid-white.svg)Security Testing Orchestration

Shift-left security by seamlessly integrating security scanners and orchestrating tests anywhere across your build pipelines, allowing developers to rapidly remediate vulnerabilities through intelligent prioritization and deduplication. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/security-testing-orchestration)

![Image 98](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

![Image 99](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6797483ca056b8bd5ffb94c7_ssca_solid-white.svg)Software Security Supply Chain

Monitor and control open source components, generate comprehensive Software Bills of Materials (SBOMs) for enhanced visibility, and guarantee software integrity in accordance with SLSA and Executive Order 14028 requirements. [Learn more](https://www.harness.io/products/software-supply-chain-assurance)

![Image 100](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/671f2678997520a67ad03423_info-icon.png)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

![Image 203](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 204](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### What is a user?

A User is an individual who has been granted direct access to the Harness platform. They can log in, perform actions in the product, and have an email address associated with Harness.

![Image 205](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 206](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### What is included in DevOps Essentials?

The package includes CI, CD, Code Repository, Security Test Orchestration, and Infrastructure as Code Management.

![Image 207](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 208](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### What kind of customer support is available?

Customers receive standard support from a dedicated customer success manager and access to Harness’s expert support team. Professional Services can be purchased as an add-on. For Enterprise prospects, premiere support is available for purchase.

![Image 209](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 210](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### Can DevOps Essentials be deployed on-premises?

No on-premise support

![Image 211](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 212](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### Can I buy other Harness Modules in the enterprise and add them to my DevOps Essential Package?

No, the package is designed for a specific set of use cases. If your business needs those capabilities, please look at our Enterprise offering.

![Image 213](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 214](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### Can we integrate DevOps Essentials with our existing tools?

Yes, DevOps Essentials supports integrations with popular tools such as monitoring services (Datadog, New Relic), ticketing systems (Jira, ServiceNow), and collaboration platforms (Slack, Microsoft Teams).

![Image 215](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 216](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### Does Harness support multi-cloud environments?

All Harness plans support deployments across multiple cloud providers, including AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, On-Premise Infrastructures, and private cloud setups

![Image 217](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 218](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### What integrations are supported out of the box?

All Harness subscription tiers integrate with popular tools such as GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Jenkins, and Kubernetes and cloud providers such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

![Image 219](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/6798a58e10ed1a8c8f2da420_Minus.svg)![Image 220](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/663be69f1082e0f1590ff4fa_baseline-plus.svg)

#### How are updates and new features managed?

Harness continuously updates DevOps Essentials and Enterprise Modules by adding new features and improvements. Customers receive updates automatically as part of their subscription.

![Image 221](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6222ca42ea87e1bd1aa1d10c/65aada95970b01f49948895a_harness_logo_white.svg)

Cookie Settings
---------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies)

Accept All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

*   ##### Security Cookies
    
    Always Active
    
    These cookies are used to authenticate users, prevent fraud, and protect users as they interact with our websites and services.
    

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and user personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of the website features may not function properly.

#### Advertising Cookies

 Advertising Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to analyze which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when our site has been visited, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
